rawdatadir.desc: Directory to find raw MRI data

dicomfolderstructure.desc: Dicom folder structure, 'flat' if all files in one directory (e.g., Robarts), 'series' if series in separate directory (e.g., CBU)

subjectoutputformat.desc: sprintf formatting string to get subject data directory from number

seriesoutputformat.desc: sprintf formatting string to get series data directory from number

dicomconverter.desc: Path to custom dicom converter MATLAB function and optional arguments (all separated with commas)

T1template.desc: Location of T1 template, now relative to SPM path

render.desc: Location of Single subject render mash

fieldmapsdirname.desc: Subdirectory in subject dir for fieldmaps

structdirname.desc: Subdirectory in subject dir for MRI structurals

specialseriesdirname.desc: Subdirectory in subject dir for special series

remotefilesystem.desc: Type of files for imaging data

allowremotecache.desc: Allow local caching of files from remote server

poolprofile.desc: Cluster Profile and (optional) initial submit argument (e.g. asking for specific queue or resource) separated with colon

mailerserver.desc: Path to file containing E-mail address and password for the mailer account for sending notifications (empty means sending no emails)

templatedir.desc: Path to folder with various templates (e.g. for module_freesurfer_deface)

matlabtoolsdir.desc: Path(s) to MATLAB tools (colon separated list)

toolbox.desc: Toolbox with implemented interface in extrafunctions/toolboxes

name.desc: Name corresponding to the name of the interface without the 'Class' suffix

toolbox.name: spm

maximumretry.desc: Maximum number of (re)tries to retrieve file

checktasksettingconsistency.desc: Check whether settings have changed since the last execution

loglevel.desc: How verbose to be: 0 - show every message; 1 - show warnings and errors only; 2 - show errors only

timelog.desc: Do we print time elapsed after each module?

autoidentifyfieldmaps.desc: Positive or negatve number indicates fieldmap after or before EPI, respectively. 0 means no fieldmaps

diagnosticvideos.desc: Enable diagnostic videos (matlab not stable on some platforms)

garbagecollection.desc: Perform garbage collection after the analysis

restorepath.desc: Restore linux and MATLAB path upon closing

parallelGUI.desc: Show GUI to monitor parallel execution?

parallelroot.desc: Path to folder where folder(s) for execution reports is created

parallelcleanup.desc: Remove parallel job folders older then the specified number of days (Empty means no cleanup)

parallelmaximumretry.desc: Maximum number of (re)tries to submit job to the scheduler

parallelwaitbeforeretry.desc: Resubmit job if parallelmaximumretry > 1 and job has been pendign for longer than this value

parallelcheckCPU.desc: Check job CPU usage (and restart sleeping jobs)?

parallelresources.desc: Settings for parallel execution on a cluster (if applicable)

memory.desc: Requested amount of memory in GB per worker

walltime.desc: Maximum amount of time (in hours) to run a job

root.desc: Root on local machine for processed data

selectedsubjects.desc: Allows subselection of a subset of subjects from the list

selectedsessions.desc: Allows subselection of a subset of sessions from the list

combinemultiple.desc: Combine multiple visits per subjects (1) or treat them as separate subjects (0)?

selectedruns.desc: Allows subselection of a subset of series from the list

correctEVfordummies.desc: Automatically correct event onset time according for dummies?

selectedruns.desc: Allows subselection of a subset of series, usually during branching

structural.desc: Series number or filename for structural

wholebrainepi.desc: Series number or filename for wholebrain EPI (for partial volume EPI)

fieldmaps.desc: Series numbers or filename for fieldmaps

fmriseries.desc: Series numbers or filename for fMRI

specialseries.desc: Specialseries Series number in raw data

ignoreseries.desc: Series to be ignored when automatically scanning raw data

name.desc: Specialseries run name (used to determine stream name and folder name)

paralleldependencies.desc: Describes relationships of different domains of processing

usecolouroutput.desc: use colour to organise text output written to display
